comments:
I Noticed a problem when I tried to do an Ant Build first thing this morning
after starting up.   First the Ant Build view would not load, then Preferences
were BLANK

I had done nothing since a successful build the day before except commit changes
to cvs.

Here is the pertinent .log entry
